channel.title: Making server
channel.description:
hee some one pleas want to help me with making my server i have somethings that i wanne change in a server but i am a begin coder dont know how so i can use some one to help me fix it its not about error but wanne change some starting things and making a nice skilling place want to make a eco server and pk
i use client and source from zanaris:)
thank you
maffia robby

item.title: Making server
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

Firstly try to add it by yourself and if it doesn’t work then u can ask for help but we don’t spoon feed you.
You will never learn anything if u never try.

Read full topic

item.title: Making server
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

There are plenty of tutorials located on the forums which can help you start up your server, there’s some key features you’ll need to properly learn as programming is Java so everything you wish to do is involved in a code.

I’d advise you to learn the basics of Java to begin with and then move onto downloading a basic source/client, I’d recommend 317 as the work their is targeted for beginners and its quite basic so it’ll be easy for yourself to understand.

Read full topic
